verbs.description: How President Trump , like Ronald Reagan before him , [V: can] win a tense showdown by simply walking away .
[ARGM-DIS: How] [ARG0: President Trump] , [ARGM-MNR: like Ronald Reagan before him] , [ARGM-MOD: can] [V: win] [ARG1: a tense showdown] [ARGM-MNR: by simply walking away] .
How [ARG0: President Trump] , like Ronald Reagan before him , can win a tense showdown by [ARGM-ADV: simply] [V: walking] [ARGM-DIR: away] .
